desc.text: Transmittal of Advertisements and Promotional Labeling for Drugs and Biologics for Human Use

assist.speak: Please select the type of number from the six choices in the drop-down list.
Please enter the correct number of digits, corresponding to the type of number you selected.
Please enter the correct number of digits, corresponding to the type of number you selected.

value.text: TRANSMITTAL OF ADVERTISEMENTS AND PROMOTIONAL LABELING FOR DRUGS AND BIOLOGICS FOR HUMAN USE

assist.speak: If this is a single product, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.
If this form is for multiple products, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.

body.p: For multiple products, submit completed form and specimen of advertising/promotional materials to one application of choice, and attach separate sheet addressing items 3-5 for remainder of products. Refer to No. 3 on instruction sheet.

assist.speak: Please type the date of submission in 2 digit month / 2 digit day / 4 digit year format.

value.text: DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES

body.p: See PRA Statement on last page.

value.text: NOTE: Form FDA 2253 is required by law. Reports are required for approved NDAs, ANDAs (21 CFR 314.81), and BLAs (601.12(f)(4))

body.p:
5.
Package Insert Date and ID Number

assist.speak: If the labeling is for professional use, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.
If the labeling is for consumer use, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.
Please type the proprietary name here.
Please type the established name here.
Please type the product code number here.
Please type the package insert I D number here.
assist.toolTip: Please type the package insert ID number here.

assist.speak: Please type the manufacturer name here.
Please type the Biologics License number here.

event.name: event__exit
event__exit
event__initialize
event__click

assist.speak: Delete this row: Click here or press the enter key to delete this row of Advertisement/Promotional Labeling Material information.
Delete this row: Click here or press the enter key to delete this row of Advertisement/Promotional Labeling Material information.
Click here or press the enter key to add an additional row of Advertisement/Promotional Labeling Material information.

body.p: To delete a row, click the “Delete Row” button for that row (or press the enter key
if you’ve tabbed into the button). You cannot delete the last remaining row.

assist.speak: Please type your comments here.

body.p:
Address 1
(Street address, P.O. box, company name c/o)

Address 2
(Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.)

assist.speak: Please type the first line of the applicant's return address here.
Please type the second line of the applicant's return address here.
Please type the applicant's city here.
Please type the applicant's state, province, or region here.
Please type the applicant's country here.
Please type the applicant's ZIP or postal code here.
Please type the responsible official or agent's phone number here, including the area code.
Please type the responsible official or agent's facsimile number here, including the area code.
Please type the responsible official or agent's e-mail address here.

body.p: 10. Typed Name and Title of Responsible Official or Agent
11. Signature of Responsible Official or Agent

assist.speak: Please type the name and title of the responsible official or agent here.
Click here or press the enter key to sign.
Please type the responsible official's or agent's signature date, in 2 digit month / 2 digit day / 4 digit year.

assist.toolTip: Click here or press the enter key to enable the signature field.
assist.speak: Click here or press the enter key to enable the signature field.

event.name: event__click

assist.speak: If the C B E R product is a Part 1 Draft, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.
assist.toolTip: If the CBER product is a Part 1 Draft, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.

assist.speak: If the C B E R product is a Part 2 Final, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.
assist.toolTip: If the CBER product is a Part 2 Final, check this box by pressing the space bar or number pad slash key.

value.text: This section applies only to requirements of the Paperwork Reduction Act of 1995.
*DO NOT SEND YOUR COMPLETED FORM TO THE PRA STAFF EMAIL ADDRESS BELOW.*

assist.speak: asterisk DO NOT SEND YOUR COMPLETED FORM TO THE PRA STAFF EMAIL ADDRESS BELOW. asterisk

value.text: The burden time for this collection of information is estimated to average 2 hours per response, including the time to review instructions, search existing data sources, gather and maintain the data needed and complete and review the collection of information. Send comments regarding this burden estimate or any other aspect of this information collection, including suggestions for reducing this burden, to:

body.p: Department of Health and Human Services

value.text: “An agency may not conduct or sponsor, and a person is not required to respond to, a collection of information unless it displays a currently valid OMB number.”
